participant_1.background: i have a children and a dogs. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male.

participant_2.name: Aditi
participant_2.personality: Passionate and adventurous, loves learning new things and exploring different cultures.
participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.
